DataElement.preferredName: First Clinical And/Or Hematologic Recurrent Or Progressive Disease Date Previous Report Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes if the date of the first clinical and/or hematologic recurrent or progressive disease was previously reported.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: First Clinical And/Or Hematologic Recurrent Or Progressive Disease Date Previous Report
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree._Relating to the examination and treatment of patients dependent on direct observation.  The term may also refer to the institution (clinic) providing this activity._Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid._Pertaining to or related to the blood and blood-forming organs._The return of a disease after a period of remission._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._A disease process that is increasing in scope or severity._The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen._Occurring prior to something else._A short textual account; having provided a short account.

ObjectClass.preferredName: First Clinical And/Or Hematologic Recurrent Disease Or Progressive Disease Date
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.:Relating to the examination and treatment of patients dependent on direct observation.  The term may also refer to the institution (clinic) providing this activity.:Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid.:Pertaining to or related to the blood and blood-forming organs.:The return of a disease after a period of remission.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:A disease process that is increasing in scope or severity.:The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

Concepts.definition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.
Relating to the examination and treatment of patients dependent on direct observation.  The term may also refer to the institution (clinic) providing this activity.
Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid.
Pertaining to or related to the blood and blood-forming organs.
The return of a disease after a period of remission.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
A clinical, pathologic, and/or molecular finding indicating that the course of a disease is worsening in terms of extent or severity.
The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurring prior to something else.:A short textual account; having provided a short account.

Concepts.definition: Occurring prior to something else.
A short textual account; having provided a short account.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Unk ND NA Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes, no, unknown, not done or not applicable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Indicates a task, process or examination that has either not been initiated or completed.

Concepts.definition: Indicates a task, process or examination that has either not been initiated or not been completed.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Unknown Not Done Not Applicable Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.:Indicates a task, process or examination that has either not been initiated or completed.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.
Indicates a task, process or examination that has either not been initiated or not been completed.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
